responseText: To the west of the ruins. Lionhold is the Kaelar army's muster point on this side of the portal. You'll find their militia holding the perimeter over that way. Some that have come to Verra have their own ambitions, though. They've drifted in this direction. So, which are you?
name: SQ_RVR_NPC_SamiasHope_Amira_10_Response
